results.name: Decimal expansion of 2*(18 + sqrt(3)*Pi)/27.
comment: Also, decimal expansion of Sum_{h >= 0} 1/binomial(2*h,h). [From Renzo Sprugnoli]
link: Renzo Sprugnoli, Sums of Reciprocals of the Central Binomial Coefficients, INTEGERS, 6 (2006), #A27, page 9.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Factorial Sums
formula: Equals A073016 plus 1. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 08 2008
mathematica: RealDigits[N[(2 (18 + Pi Sqrt@3))/27, 120]] // First (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 11 2015 *)
xref: Cf. A248179: decimal expansion of Sum_{h >= 0} 1/binomial(2*h+1,h).
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jan 28 2004
